name: update statement
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE drivers SET driver_desc = '" + msg.new_driver_desc + "', driver_name = '" + msg.new_driver_name + "' WHERE driver_id = '" + msg.new_driver_id + "'";

return msg;

name: check drivers
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id='" + msg.payload + "';";

return msg;

name: check vehicles
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id='" + msg.payload + "';";

return msg;

name: search statement
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id LIKE '%" + msg.search_data + "%' OR driver_desc LIKE '%" + msg.search_data + "%' OR driver_name LIKE '%" + msg.search_data + "%';";

return msg;

name: CSS
format:
<style>
    .tabulator {
        padding-left: 2px;
        border: 0px solid #BBB;
        background-color: #111217;
        font-size: 18px;
        font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
    }

    /****/

    /* Header formatieren */
    .tabulator-col-title {
        background-color: gold;
        color: blue;
        font-family: "Comic Sans MS", sans-serif;
    }

    /****/
    .tabulator .tabulator-header {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #BBB;
    }

    .tabulator-col-content {
        background-color: #111217;
        height: 37px
    }

    .tabulator .tabulator-header .tabulator-col {
        border-right: 0px solid #aaa;
        background-color: #111217
    }

    .tabulator-arrow {
        visibility: collapse;
    }

    .tabulator .tabulator-header .tabulator-col.tabulator-sortable .tabulator-col-title {
        padding-right: 2px;
    }

    /* Zellen formatieren*/
    .tabulator-table .tabulator-row-odd {
        min-height: 31px;
        background-color: yellow;
        color: red;
    }

    /****/
    .tabulator-table .tabulator-row-even {
        min-height: 31px;
        background-color: red;
        color: yellow;
    }

    /****/
    .tabulator-row .tabulator-cell {
        border-right: 0px solid #888;
        padding-top: 4px;
    }
</style>

name: CSS
format:
<style>

.tabulator-table {
    background: transparent !important;*/
    font-size: 28px !important;
}
.tabulator-row .tabulator-cell{
    border-right: 1px solid #8880 !important;
}
.tabulator-row{
    font-size: 28px !important;
    background-color: #713b3b !important;
}
.tabulator-row:nth-child(2n){
    font-size: 28px !important;
    background-color: #8e000000 !important;
}

.tabulator-header{
    border-bottom: 2px solid #dd0000 !important;
    font-size: 46px !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-ui_table{
    background-color: transparent !important;
    font-size: 36px !important;
}

</style>

name: insert statement
set statement
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE drivers SET driver_flag = 1 WHERE id = '" + msg.payload[0].id + "'";

return msg;
